import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' function ModalUpdate(props){ const {handleClose ,show, dataCouseUpdate} = props; const [data, setData] = useState({ image:'', title: '', description: '' }) useEffect(() => { if(show){ setData(dataCouseUpdate.image, dataCouseUpdate.title, dataCouseUpdate.description) } },[dataCouseUpdate]); return ( Add New Course
setData([...data, data.image = e.target.value])} value={data.image} />
setData([...data, data.title = e.target.value])} value={data.title} />
setData([...data, data.description = e.target.value])} value={data.description} />
) } export default ModalUpdate;
